name: Super Gene
author: Twelve-Winged Dark Seraphim
content: As foretold, countless alien monsters have invaded the world but by eating them, humans can obtain their genes. With this, mankind began a new era of gene evolution. Hansen, a newcomer to the sanctuary is regarded as a ‘Crazy Demon’ but no-one knows that he is also the ‘B God’ respected by everyone. Hansen: Sorry but only I can obtain the Super Gene!
